tag_list: sourav-sharma, sourav, seo, seo-india, seo-costa-rica, best-seo, experienced-seo, advanced-seo, technical-seo
overview:
Sourav Sharma has over 8 years of experience with a sustained record of successfully implementing large projects, taking startups to the next level of growth, leading new teams, facilitating effective positive change, & driving strong revenue growth.

Sourav Sharma is strong in creating Internet Marketing Strategies (SEO, Social Media, PPC, Viral Marketing); developing a comprehensive plan that incorporates all possible and relevant Internet Marketing tools, measurements, and techniques with your online business model. He brings extensive knowledge in web technologies and Web Usability.

Sourav has been involved in online space since 2001 and has experience of technology and marketing. He has also helped individuals, business and investment-minded organizations regarding investment in Internet businesses and technologies.

He is also working as Advisor to many small and large scale SEO Companies and startups.

relationships.title: Sr. Manager Online Marketing & Social Media
